alert.note: Alert for Rice (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Rice County through 1000 PM CDT... At 930 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lonsdale, or 15 miles west of Northfield, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lonsdale around 935 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Faribault. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 59 and 66. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
